snippet: After a one-sided argument, the Supreme Court appeared unlikely to allow jurors to testify about deliberations, even to expose dishonesty in jury selection.
abstract: Truncated and unusually one-sided argument leaves impression that Supreme Court is unlikely to allow jurors to testify about their deliberations, even to expose dishonesty during jury selection; case arose from injury lawsuit in which one juror accused another of bias.
lead_paragraph: After a one-sided argument, the Supreme Court appeared unlikely to allow jurors to testify about deliberations, even to expose dishonesty in jury selection.

headline.main: Justices Hear Case on Allowing Testimony by Jurors
headline.print_headline: Justices Hear Case on Allowing Testimony by Jurors
